trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
Represents the method that will handle the <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesignerChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 表示用来处理 <see cref="E:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesignerChanged" /> 事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesignerChanged> event is raised when the currently active document has been modified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesignerChanged>当前处于活动状态的文档已被修改时将引发事件。

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventHandler> delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventHandler> 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，请将该委托的一个实例添加到事件中。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，否则每当发生该事件时就会调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB： 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates registering an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventHandler> and handling an <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesignerChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例说明如何注册<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ActiveDesignerEventHandler>和处理<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IDesignerEventService.ActiveDesignerChanged>事件。
